title: Elsewhile...
author: verias
text:
Hidden Name Kristy

Looks like Melody made it inside safely, but is everyone else alright?

replies.author: adamas*Guest*
replies.text: *rubs his hands in anticipation* This gonna be good.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: I wonder why Melody didn't tend to her daughter herself?
